blocks.content: Define the _centralizer_ of a subset of a magma, which is the set of elements each of which commutes with each element of the given subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cntz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccntz, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cntz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ Cntz =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s2[(+ ` s0)]s3)=(s3[(+ ` s0)]s2))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-cntr
blocks.content: Define the _center_ of a magma, which is the elements that commute with all others. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: cntrval
blocks.content: Substitute definition of the center. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cntrval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(ccntr, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccntz, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(ccntr, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(ccntr, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, ccntr, cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(cfv(ccntz, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccntz, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(ccntz, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, ccntz)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cbs)
  df-cntr(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(ccntr, c2), cfv(emptycls, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  0fv(c1)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(ccntz, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, ccntz)
  fvprc(c2, ccntr)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cntrval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=(Cntr ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Cntz ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)=(Cntr ` c2), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqcomd((c0 ` c1), (Cntr ` c2), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, ccntr, (c0 ` c1), ((Cntz ` hs0)`(Base ` hs0)))
  fveq12d((Cntz ` hs0), (Base ` hs0), c0, c1, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr((Cntz ` hs0), c0, (Cntz ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, ccntz)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cbs)
  df-cntr(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  3eqtr4a((c0 ` c1), (Cntr ` c2), (‚àÖ ` c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  0fv(c1)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (Cntz ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, ccntz)
  fvprc(c2, ccntr)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
}

thm cntzfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s2, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))), cfv(ccntz, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ccntz, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, ccntz, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  ralbidv(s2, cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  df-cntz(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mptex(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
}

thm cntzfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))})), d(s0, c4))

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))})), d(s2, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}), (Cntz ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (Cntz ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, ccntz, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}), (s0 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s2)=(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s1))}))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P((Base ` hs0)), { s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s2)=(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s1))}, P(c3), { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}, hs0 = c0)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s2)=(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s1)), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1)))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  ralbidv(s2, s0, hs0 = c0, (s1[(+ ` hs0)]s2)=(s2[(+ ` hs0)]s1), (s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))
  eqeq12d((s1[(+ ` hs0)]s2), (s2[(+ ` hs0)]s1), (s1[c4]s2), (s2[c4]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (+ ` hs0), s2, c4, hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s2, (+ ` hs0), s1, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c4, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)

  mptex(s0, P(c3), { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))})

  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)=(s2[c4]s1))}))

  rabbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))))
  raleq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))))))
  rabex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c4)
  adantr(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))))))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))), cfv(emptycls, c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))

  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wss(c0, cfv(c3, c2)), wss(c2, cfv(c3, c0))))

  a1i(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)))))))
  bitri(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1))))), wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0))))))
  ralcom(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs0))))

  sscntz(hs1, hs0, c2, c1, c0, c3, cfv(cplusg, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  sscntz(hs1, hs0, c2, c1, c0, c3, (+ ` c4), c4)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, cfv(c2, csn(cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, c0), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, cfv(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), crab(hs0, c1, wral(s0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, c1))

  syl6eq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, cfv(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), crab(hs0, c1, wral(s0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0))))), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0)))))), wss(c0, c1))

blocks.name: cntzidss
blocks.content: If the elements of ` S ` commute, the elements of a subset ` T ` also commute. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cntzidss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0)), wss(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntz, c3))
} = {
  sstrd(c2, cfv(c1, c2), c0, wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0)))
  simpr(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0))
  sstrd(c0, cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c0), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0)))
  sylancom(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0), wss(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl6ss(c0, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(c1, c0), wa(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0)))
  simpl(wss(c0, cfv(c1, c0)), wss(c2, c0))
  cntzssv(c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  cntz2ss(c0, cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c1, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
}

  oveq1d((hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0), (-g ` c1), hs0, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), ((c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0)), (hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0)=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), hs1 ‚àà((Cntz ` c1)`(Base ` c1)), hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1))

thm cntrnsg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntr, c0))
} = {
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wss(c1, c1))
  syl5eqel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  eqtr4i(c1, cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(ccntr, c0))
  cntrval(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ssid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  cntzsubg(c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(ccntz, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
  ssid(c1)
  cntrsubgnsg(c1, c0, c1)
}
